name: Electroquest: Resistance is Futile
description: Welcome to Electroquest: Resistance is Futile! This brainteaser is a good opportunity to check your knowledge of electrical engineering and improve your logical thinking. Test your engineering skills and try to put all the elements of an electric circuit in the right places.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 or AMD Radeon HD 6750 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space
